Name: Mathematics for the Physical Sciences (Dover Books on Mathematics)

ReviewList.Text: Although this book has standard chapters like "The Wave and Heat Conduction Equations"; "Foruier tTRansform"; "Laplace Transform"; "The Gamma Function"; "Bessel Functions", the mathematical language used in this book is not really geared towards physicists. This book is not so readable. I would not recommend this book for non-math graduate students.
